dialogue.introduction: Kumaa. Nice to meet you, kuma.
dialogue.library_intro: First ship of the Kuma-class light cruisers, Kuma kuma. Born in Sasebo kuma. I got some old parts, but I'll try my best, kumaa.
dialogue.secretary3: Don't pat me, kuma. I'm not a teddy bear, kuma~
dialogue.secretaryidle: Ku~…ma~… it, it's not like I'm bored, Kuma. I'm enjoying this fully, Kuma!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, thanks for you hard work kuma. Taking a break from time-to-time is good, kuma.
dialogue.wedding: Fufufu~ I've caught the Admiral, kuma. I'm not gonna let you go, kuma. Kumakuma~!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I almost thought I was going to die there, kuma~!
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been made, kuma~.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Mission complete. Do you want to see the report, kuma?
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Choosing Kuma is a good choice, kuma.
dialogue.mvp: I'm often told that I am an unexpectedly excellent Kuma-chan, kuma.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: For Kuma to be damaged to this point... what a disgrace, kuma...
dialogue.sunk: Kuma did what she could, but... this is the end kuma....
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: I hate Tsuyu kuma. Kuuuumaaaa… kuuuumaaaa… Aah! I hate the rain　kuma. Kuuumaaa...
dialogue.midsummer_2015: It's summer! I'm going swimming, kuma~. Watch Kuma's river swimming technique kuma. I'll catch salmon too, kuma~. Ah... that was a joke, kuma.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's cleaning time kuma. Kuma will also do her best, kuma. But I'm already tired of it kuma. Gonna run, kuma.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year kuma. May it be well, kuma. I'll do my best this year too! Ku↘ma↗!
